body:
Also adds a `list_url`.

#### Before
```
$ spack versions xz
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  5.2.2  5.2.0
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  5.2.3
```
#### After
```
$ spack versions xz
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  5.2.3  5.2.2  5.2.0
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  5.2.1  5.0.8  5.0.7  5.0.6  5.0.5  5.0.4  5.0.3  5.0.2  5.0.1  5.0.0  4.999.9beta
```
title: Add latest version of xz
